data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Jost Van Dyke.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 86 believers in the state of Jost Van Dyke the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Jost Van Dyke prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Jost Van Dyke to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 300 people living in Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands
data.section_summary:
the state of Jost Van Dyke, British Virgin Islands has a population of 300.

We estimate Jost Van Dyke has 86 people who might know Jesus, 186 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 28 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
